About Me

Tomi Vilpponen

BIO

I'm a student in LUT University studying computer science and also a freelance software developer and graphic designer. Gamer and Cofounder of Lisco eSports ry. Fluently, I can speak finnish, english and russian. I play floorball and ride motorcycles as a hobby. My favourite game is Counter-Strike.

Lisco eSports ry

Cofounder

Cofounder and vice-chairman for Lisco eSports ry. Lisco is a non profit organization for gamers to come and play with other people in a safe and fun environment. Our goal is for everyone to have a place to go and not be lonely. Read more: https://lisco.gg

SPX Graphics

SPX template developer

Making graphics templates for various companies. Read more: https://spx.graphics

Hyvinkää City Library (2021-2022)

Caretaker and graphic designer

Processing returned material and general supervision. Graphic design for the library, e.g. making advertisements and bulletins.
